[vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″]

Contact us

[vc_column_text]Whether you have purchased our mechanical products or not, if you have any questions now, you are very welcome to consult our account manager, and he will find a suitable solution for you [GO][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_single_image image=”3725″ img_size=”full” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” css_animation=”none” link=”/contact-us/”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″]

Downloads

[vc_column_text]Here are our product manuals, corporate brochures, user manuals, and other documents. You are welcome to download. [GO][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_single_image image=”3726″ img_size=”full” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”fadeInLeft” link=”/downloads/”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″]

FAQ

[vc_column_text]What type of machine do I need, how much power do I need to configure an air compressor, how to deliver goods to my country, how to repair and replace parts when the machine fails, and answers to various common questions can be found here [GO][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_single_image image=”3727″ img_size=”full” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”rotateInDownRight” link=”/faq/”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″]

Sales manager

[vc_column_text]Writing is too slow? Get in touch with our sales manager directly. Through the app, we can provide you with services faster. [GO][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_single_image image=”3728″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″]

Where we are

[vc_column_text]You are welcome to personally visit our two factories in Taizhou, China. Our account manager will entertain you warmly. At the same time, we also provide customers with technical staff training services. [GO][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_single_image image=”3729″ img_size=”full” onclick=”custom_link” link=”/about-us-2/”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1598251671736{background-color: #1e73be !important;}”][vc_column]
